price: 无疑的，安拉知道他们所隐讳的，和他们所表白的，他确是不喜爱自大者的。
arabic: لَا جَرَمَ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ يَعۡلَمُ مَا يُسِرُّونَ وَمَا يُعۡلِنُونَۚ إِنَّهُۥ لَا يُحِبُّ ٱلۡمُسۡتَكۡبِرِينَ

version.title: Chinese Translation - Mohammed Suleiman
version.description: Translation of the Qur’an meanings into Chinese, translated by Mohammed Makin, reviewed by Mohammed Suleiman with other specialists.

meta.transliteration: lā jarama anna al-laha yaʿlamu mā yusirrūna wamā yuʿ'linūna innahu lā yuḥibbu al-mus'takbirīna
